remarks: The order of the direct product of groups.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmhash.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmhash.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
lsmhash.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
lsmhash.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmhash.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmhash.i $e |- ( ph -> ( T i^i U ) = { .0. } ) $.
lsmhash.s $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) $.
lsmhash.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. Fin ) $.
lsmhash.2 $e |- ( ph -> U e. Fin ) $.
lsmhash $p |- ( ph -> ( # ` ( T .(+) U ) ) = ( ( # ` T ) x. ( # ` U ) ) ) $.
